title: The Face of the high Arctic
creator_credit: Dalton Muir, Hugh O'Connor, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A study of the geological evolution that has gone on for millions of years. Treeless wastes bear evidence of glaciers that advanced and receded, and of life forms that changed with the climate. The film tracks the cataclysmic forces that passed over this Arctic land.
